   sphinx-quickstart on Thu Apr  1 14:37:38 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to CHARIS Test's documentation!
=======================================

Welcome to the beginner's guide of CHARIS Test pipeline! This documentation contains all you need to get it set up on your device and have it reduce your astronomical data.

If you are new to CHARIS Test, :ref:`install the pipeline first <settingup>` and then explore these pages:

* Importing Data
* Reducing Data
* Saving and Exporting Files

   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:
   :caption: Start Here

   beforeyoubegin

   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:
   :caption: Beginners

   importingdata

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:
   :caption: Advanced

   reducingdata
   savingexporting
